sentences.en: And he does everything he canto take my son along with him!
sentences.cn: 而且他还尽全力去拉拢我儿子!

sentences.en: Bel canto in pop singing - Is that innovation, or some useless gimmick?
sentences.cn: 美声唱流行 —— 勇于创新还是不伦不类?

sentences.en: Chinese singing style is a bIt'similar to bel canto.
sentences.cn: 中国的传统演唱方法和美声有点相似.

sentences.en: First , the singer must master the technique of bel canto, which is the basic requirement.
sentences.cn: 演唱者应正确掌握了西洋美声唱法的技术要领, 这是前提条件.

sentences.en: For other uses, see Bel canto ( disambiguation ).
sentences.cn: 作其他用途, 见美声唱法 ( 歧 ).

sentences.en: Garcia is the well - known authority on the teaching of bel canto and theory of vocal music.
sentences.cn: 加尔西亚 是世界公认的美声学派声乐教学和声乐理论的权威.

sentences.en: He sings songs very well, but also Bel Canto.
sentences.cn: 他唱歌唱得非常好, 还会美声唱法.

sentences.en: I love to listen and dance to Canto - Pop but I can't understand the words at all!
sentences.cn: 我喜欢听粤语流行歌曲并用它来伴舞,可我根本什么都听不懂!

sentences.en: It's the passage from Spenser's cave of Mammon canto that describes this same scene of violation, the violation of mother earth.
sentences.cn: 这是斯潘塞笔下描写贪神之洞的长诗的篇章,它描述了对于大地母亲粗暴冒犯的场景。

sentences.en: Mathilde Marchesi ( 1821 –1913 ), a famous teacher of bel canto repertoire.
sentences.cn: 玛蒂尔德迈凯 ( 1821年至1913年 ), 一位著名的老师美声唱法曲目.

sentences.en: Once again, the dangers of Dante's poetic vocation are dramatized in the canto that immediately follows.
sentences.cn: 再次, 但丁的诗职业的危险,戏剧化的坎是紧跟.

sentences.en: Only by understanding and mastering the skill of attack correctly, can we sing Bel Canto beautifully.
sentences.cn: 因此, 要想唱出美妙的歌声,必须从理解并把握正确的起音技术开始.

sentences.en: The Fifth Canto of the Srimad Bhagavatam tells of innumerable universes.
sentences.cn: 《圣典博伽瓦谭》第五篇讲述了有无数宇宙存在.

sentences.en: There are two schools of singing ways in bel canto.
sentences.cn: 美声唱法分为“靠前”与“靠后”两大学派.

sentences.en: Wholesome canto needs sexual, establishment has productivity.
sentences.cn: 卫生篇章必有性, 设施具备生产性.

sentences.en: Writing new canto with book of nuclear energy domain again.
sentences.cn: 又在和核能领域书写新的篇章.

trans.tran_cn: 长诗中的篇（相当于书中的“章”）
trans.tran_en: one of the parts into which a very long poem is divided
